5D83A54C.Line1.FBBB9: I killed for my faith, burned and tortured. When I died in that forsaken place, it was without the grace of the Light.

728E895D.Line11.FBBB9: Their path to salvation led me only into darkness. Now it is blood that gives me purpose. I will drink the life of this world...forever.

CC8D0B79.VoiceDir1.FBBB9: His seething rage rests just below the surface, only breaking into full anger at the final line.
